Pin.Name: RS232 RCV
Pin.Description: RS-232: receive signal from the host

Pin.Name: RS232 XMT
Pin.Description: RS-232: transmit signal to the host

Child.Name: VoltageExcitationValue
Child.Description: Sets Voltage Excitation to 5 or 10 Volt

Connector.Name: J1
Connector.Description: J1: 25 pin D-subminiature, Signal I/O, Channels 1-3

Port.Description: MSCD Channel 1 Excitation Constant Current Output

Port.Description: MSCD Channel 2 Excitation Constant Current Output

Port.Description: MSCD Constant Voltage Excitation value for all ports

SubModule.Description: Set this SubModule Port Enabled to true to turn on Port 1,2,3 Voltage Excitation

Port.Description: MSCD Constant Voltage Excitation enable ports 1,2,3
